title: Millet flour as a potential ingredient in fish sausage for health and sustainability

Flour from nine varieties of millets – Finger millet, Foxtail millet, Little millet, Kodo millet, Pearl millet, Proso millet, Barnyard millet, Browntop millet and Sorghum were compared against corn flour...
